abstract: Great Britain's plans to use upcoming visit by Chinese Pres Xi Jinping to forge economic ties with China draws criticism from international community for focusing on commerce while ignoring China’s human rights, cybersecurity and territorial violations.
lead_paragraph: The British government has been criticized by many for putting commercial interests ahead of other concerns, including human rights, cybersecurity and China’s growing territorial ambitions.

headline.main: For Visit by Xi Jinping, Britain Will Prioritize Commerce With China
headline.print_headline: For Xi’s Visit, Britain Plans to Prioritize Commerce

snippet: The British government has been criticized by many for putting commercial interests ahead of other concerns, including human rights, cybersecurity and China’s growing territorial ambitions.
